name: UncharGreek
description:
UncharGreek 1.0 by Théophile CATELLA

-----------------------------------

CONTROLS

Z                            Move Forward
Q                           Move left
D                           Move right
S                            Move backward
SPACE               Jump
SHIFT                Sprint
MOUSE            Camera

-----------------------------------

PITCH

You must find Ophion's dagger, the snake-shaped primordial titan, and return to your car. 

-----------------------------------

SPECIFICATION CHART

- Uncharted-like gameplay : jump, run, ledge-grab

- About 5 min of gameplay

- "Half-openned world". This level is situated at the beginning of the adventure, just after the main tutorial sections. 

- The spawn is also the end of the map. The Player must return to his starting point by a different way than the one he took on the outward. 

- On the outward, offer at least one hidden zone, considering risks & rewards. The Player must obtain an item (hard reward) after a simple puzzle.

- The scene takes place outside and inside an ancient greek temple, worn by the elements but eventually still standing. 

-----------------------------------

PUZZLE TRANSLATION 

"To move forward, you sometimes must gather.
Only he who will unite the three brothers around their common characters will cross.

Remember their names : 
ZEUS
POSEIDON
HADES"

-----------------------------------

GAMEPLAY PRECISIONS

1 - About collectibles

Collectibles are green. There are :

2 soft rewards : coins (X40) and plants (X22)

1 medium reward : dog statuettes (X7)

1 hard reward : Ophion's Dagger (X1)

2 - About ledges

- Only tagged blocs are considered ledges

- Ledge-grabbing isn't animated

- The player can move on ledge as if it was ground

- The player cannot jump from ledges

- The player isn't "sticked" to ledges, as Nathan Drake could be in Uncharted (Naugthy Dogs, 2007 - 2017)

3 - About checkpoints

- When the player falls from a certain height, he's considered killed. He's teleported to the last checkpoint crossed.

- There are 7 checkpoints : 4 outside and 3 inside.

-----------------------------------

CONTACT

If you have any questions, offers or if you just want to download the game or the Unity project, please contact me :

- theophile.catella@gmail.com
- 07 86 17 19 85
- http://theophilecatella.alwaysdata.net/

-----------------------------------

PUZZLE RESOLUTION 

Please consider reading the following solution only and only if you absolutely don't understand the puzzle.

Their common character are the letters we fond both in "ZEUS", "POSEIDON" and "HADES". That is to say "S" and "E". Jump on thoses letters, and you'll be able to cross.
